3D Interface for Data Browsing

This project aims to improve the data query process when using data portals by visualizing metadata of data.
3D visualization is utilized here with height representing time.
Jiangsu province, located in East China, straddles the Yangtze and Huaihe Rivers. The comprehensive competitiveness of Jiangsu's provincial economy ranks first in the country, and it is one of the most economically active provinces in China. It is used here as the test area.
This 3D interface chooses several categories of data and visualizes data category, data size, and data quality.
Typical component of data quality, completeness is selected to represent the basic data quality information. The social data we utilize here is the location of published paper's authors' institutions.

Explore >>

Information
3D Interface for Data Browsing
X
3D Interface for Data Browsing

The test area is Jiangsu province, which is the one of the most economically active provinces in China. Several categories of data in this province are selected and space time cube is utilized here with height representing time. Metadata of those data are visualized here in this interface with color hue, size, and saturation visualizing data category, data size, and completeness separately. For the base map, color value indicates the total amount of data in each city of Jiangsu province.


Design, Development, Data & Modelling - Mengyao Gao
Program - Cartography M.Sc.
Map engine - Mapbox GL JS
Graphing engine - Three.js
